name: LD39: Running Out of Power
description:
The zombie apocalypse is upon you. You've managed to make your way to an old abandoned lighthouse.

Outside, the wind howls as hordes of zombies make their way towards your shelter.

Your only hope is to keep the lighthouse powered until rescue arrives.

How long will you keep the power running for? Will it be enough?

Left and Right keys = Move left and right
Up and Down keys = Interact with crank, door, ladder and mice
